channel.title: Server help
channel.description:
Tried to use this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,502692.0.html
When some people download my client and when they hit run the cmd prompt will pop up and disappear or they will get a message "Path not specified". Also the people that could get on had to download the newest version of JDK to even get on the server but they can play other private servers and runescape.
New to this just need some help please. Any Ideas?

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Your path is not specified, as the command prompt says, you have to set the path.

Read full topic

item.title: Server help

item.description:

Tried to use this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,502692.0.html

When some people download my client and when they hit run the cmd prompt will pop up and disappear or they will get a message “Path not specified”.
Also the people that could get on had to download the newest version of JDK to even get on the server but they can play other private servers and runescape.

New to this just need some help please.
Any Ideas?
